Text: Preaching to the ChoirYou recently visited ImproveNowcom and initiated a free topdown Improve Your Boss or Improve Your Company assessment Im writing today to thank you for your interest in ImproveNow and to let you know about the new Custom Survey Development services we now offer in response to overwhelming customer requests Ill keep the sell copy to a minimum here Since youve used our tools I know Im preaching to the choir when I tell you that surveys in general and online surveys in particular are one of the fastest and most powerful ways to bring about improvement in your organization ImproveNowcom will work with you to create customized online surveys for your organization that are Fast and CostEffective Hosted by ImproveNow which saves you Admin IT overhead Easy to Administer and Interpret Scalable across Multiple Departments Locations Our areas of expertise and benefits to you include the following RetentionSpecific Employee Surveys Employee Retention Employee Opinion Surveys Morale Communications Productivity Degree Feedback Surveys Team Leadership Development Personality Style Analysis Team Leadership Development JobFit Assessments Employee Satisfaction and Retention Exit Surveys Employee Retention Our Custom Survey Development services are priced according to the scope of the project If you think we may be of service please respond with the following info and we will be in touch shortly or please feel free to contact me directly at the number below Your Name Job Title Company Web Address Phone Email Number of employees participating Brief description of the project Your timeline Thanks again for taking the time to use our tools We appreciate the trust youve shown us to date so we will not abuse your trust in us with repeated solicitations This is a SPECIAL ONE TIME ONLY notification if youre not interested simply ignore this notice Best regards chuck Charles Luce CoFounder VP mailto
